name: The Last Of Anime ❤️
description:
The Last of Anime is a cool open-world shooter. Your task is to clean up the destroyed city. A pistol, submachine gun and sniper rifle will help you defeat your enemies. Explore the area, fight with opponents and enjoy the beautiful scenery.

Features


  • Beautiful character
  • Three types of weapons
  • Two types of dangerous enemies
  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Post-apocalyptic world
